snippet.title: Slime Garden - Slime Snap - Lokijki
snippet.description:
Play Slime Garden on itch.io ▶ https://borderline.itch.io/slime-garden

Slime Garden is a contemplative game in which you explore a procedural world and meet its joyful inhabitants.

The game is geared toward sharing your discoveries and the only action you can perform is taking a picture which pauses the game, gives you a description of what is on it and gives you the possibility to share it on Twitter or save it locally.

Reach the center of the island to regenerate it.
